nodes.text: The Scarlet Dominon was a Nau'ur-class yacht custom made by Kalevala Spaceworks for Aurelia Tagge of the Tagge family. It had chromium highlights that were often highlighted by lifestyle paparazzi during the Imperial Era.
The Scarlet Dominion was first mentioned in the 2020 Fantasy Flight Games Star Wars Roleplaying supplement, Starships and Speeders.
